website_summaries.verdict: This cost-effective TPU-certified protector is our pick for deep mattresses.
pros: We love its hypoallergenic terrycloth top and that it is free of chemicals like phthalates and fire retardants, which can be irritating or carry odors
cons: Thin build and elastic weakens over time

customer_reviews.title: Don't Do What I Did!
customer_reviews.text: I spent $100 for mattress covers at the store. Salesman said they were not the cheap ones, they worked great, they had a lifetime warranty. First time my kid peed the bed she was near the edge. WARRANTY DOESNT COVER THE EDGE. Warranty only covers the surface. Useless. I ordered these this time. They are exactly the same as the $100 ones. There's no crunching sound, they're a soft terry cloth like material with a waterproof backing. Kids have peed on them, sadly, 4 times now. Doing well in wash too. This is all you need to protect your mattresses.
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with purchase
customer_reviews.text: Did a little test with water before I put the pad on, please see attached picture. Fits nicely and not too thick. I am satisfied with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!! Love this thing and everyone should have one!
customer_reviews.text: I use a sheet on top of this protector and I can’t hear a thing! Without the colored sheet: not scratchy and still don’t get hardly any plastic noises. Water test= didn’t go through!! Mattress protected! It’s the perfect size, snug but not hard to get on the mattress.. also, My mattress is about 1 1/2 feet tall and this protected still has plenty of fabric to tuck under. It could definitely fit around a standard box spring AND mattress. (The gray part of my bed is the frame)
customer_reviews.author: Kira

customer_reviews.title: With 3 cats and a messy 19 month old kid I'm glad I made this purchase
customer_reviews.text: We previously had a waterproof mattress protector that we bought with our mattress but it fell apart the second time I washed it. This one has held up so well in comparision. I wash it every so often and hang it to dry and we've had NO problems with it at all. We have zero stains on our mattress because of this protector. With 3 cats and a messy 19 month old kid I'm glad I made this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen

customer_reviews.title: Great for incontinence, NOT for regular mattress protections
customer_reviews.text: This is a waterproof mattress cover that fits and sounds like a baby mattress cover. The plastic underside makes a definitive crinkling noise and the material on top is a stiff weave making it something you would not want to directly sleep on. We Put a flannel fitted sheet over it, and then the regular cotton fitted sheet to help dull the noise and plastic feel. If you need a mattress protector for an incontinence issue, this would work really well. It if you’re just looking to protect your mattress from regular wear and tear type staining, don’t get it. Makes a lot of rustling noise and isn’t padded at all.
customer_reviews.author: SuburbanHousewifeMN

customer_reviews.title: Could.  Not.  Sleep.
customer_reviews.text: As an adult, I purchased this to protect my mattress from my new puppy's peeing on it. However, I couldn't sleep. I was up until 2:30 AM after trying to go to sleep around 10:30. When I took this off, I was asleep within 20 minutes. This holds heat and I was extremely hot laying on it. I do not recommend it. While it may be water resistant and such, it holds heat and did not work for me.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Ziegler

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this because I have a newborn and someone told me to invest in one because at some point, the baby is going to pee or vomit on our bed. Well, before he had a chance, my cat decided to. I was thinking how lucky I was to have bought this recently. But when I removed it to wash, the mattress smelled like urine. I even waited several hours and smelled it again just to be sure it wasn't lingering somehow. Do not purchase if you need something waterproof! Other than that, it is soft and does not crinkle when you move.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Finally!  My mattress not only stays dry, it doesnt have any odor!
customer_reviews.text: This product has been incredible for us. We have an old cat that is periodically incontinent. The mattress cover can easily be cleaned right then with either pet spray and/or diaper wipes. I also tend to have juice or water at the bed all day (I am handicapped) Accidental spills clean right up until time for weekly wash. I absolutely love it! We had recently gotten a mattress topper and wanted it to stay clean- its certainly done the trick for us!
customer_reviews.author: Angie Feingold

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it
customer_reviews.text: I got this cover to protect my king size 14” mattress from spills and potty accidents. The first time water spilled on it, my mattress did not get wet. The second time my son had an accident and I caught it right away, removed the cover and my mattress was dry. But the third time, my son had an accident and I did not catch it right away like the last time and my mattress got wet. I have tried three different mattress covers. All different brands and none of them protect 100%. It’s very frustrating when you spend money to protect your things to have it not work.
customer_reviews.author: jovi

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: WORST product I’ve ever received from amazon. I’m guessing all of the 5 star reviews are fake. This mattress protector is so thin and feel like a cheap dollar tree towel with a tarp on the underside. It has no padding and is cheaply made. Spend a little extra and buy a different one.
customer_reviews.author: J.M.

customer_reviews.title: Noisy
customer_reviews.text: This is advertised as being silent but it is very noisy. It sounds like you are laying on newspaper. The material it is lined on top with is a weird material too which is not soft. I haven't tested the other features- waterproof, etc. but I would guess it probably works for functionally. I ended up getting the COOP brand one which is a little more expensive but silent.
customer_reviews.author: Josh

customer_reviews.title: Amazing quality!!
customer_reviews.text: It fits my 10 in thick queen mattress perfect and has enough room for a thicker one no problem. I also dumped a bottle of water on it to test it and not a single drop went through. The water only expanded but the mattress was completely dry! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Savannah

customer_reviews.title: Liquid got through to my mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Liquid got through to my new mattress!!!!! So angry. My baby was sleeping on my bed amd his baby bottle leaked and milk went through onto my brand new mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Frankie

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.  NOT waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Not waterproof! My daughter had an accident on our bed and this did not save the day. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Melia

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof mattress pad protector I've EVER bought!
customer_reviews.text: Sometimes one can't tell whether or not to make a purchase by the reviews. But in THIS case, I'm grateful for all the previous reviewers' comments. They spoke well enough for me to buy this one. It is ALL they described. It is perfectly protecting my mattress, and not noisy when turning over on the bed, it's a perfect fit for my 14 inch thick mattress, and it has been laundered twice and has been just like new when removed from the washer AND the dryer. HIGHLY recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Nah Nah

customer_reviews.title: The only review you need
customer_reviews.text: I use this for a bed in a room where my dogs stay during the day while I am at work. They have peed on this cover multiple times in the first day. The cover help up beautifully. Absolutely no moisture made it to the mattress. There are reviews saying this product falls apart in the wash. They are false. The people who destroyed their product clearly do not know how to do laundry. Machine wash on DELICATE! Dry at low temp. You will have no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jon

customer_reviews.title: NOT WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: NOT WATERPROOF like it states. Now have pee stain on my sons mattress. Returning!!! Also ordered another one that I will be returning as soon as its delivered!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for, not much!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely has plastic liner, which I did not want. The bottom doesn't have a tag, so putting it on the bed is a guessing game. Very cheap quality, you get what you pay for. Towel like top layer that goes right under the fitted sheet. It is not fit overly well, just kind of loosely sits on the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney

customer_reviews.title: Towel-like texture, but overall, a good cover
customer_reviews.text: I was a little surprised upon opening the package because the texture is that of a bath towel. Once you put sheets over it, that isn’t much of an issue. It isn’t too thick and it doesn’t make any noise which is good. The fitted parts of the cover are a nylon texture and very deep so it wraps around the mattress nicely and doesn’t seem like it would be easy to slip or move around, and fits well around my mattress. I can’t make any comments about the water resistance yet as there haven’t been any spills or accidents- but I will update my review when that does happen.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Almost none of these are a 100% waterproof but
customer_reviews.text: that does not mean these are worthless. They do need to be used with something else. These are good if you have someone who Pee's heavily in bed daily. It makes the clean up way easier by soaking up most of the pee. If you want to make your bed waterproof get some heavy duty plastic wrap, strong duct tape (from your local home improvement store) and wrap your bed like your wrapping a christmas present and then put this on top of it.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected!
customer_reviews.text: Just received yesterday. It was better then I expected, especially for the price (plus free shipping from Amazon!). I washed before using and it laundered beautifully. Fit my queen bed perfectly. I especially liked the terry-cloth top as it keeps the bottom sheet nicely in place.. No plastic rustling sound. I am going to order another one for my guest bedroom. I rarely post reviews unless I feel I can highly recommend the product.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Style works great with my sleep number bed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my new sleep number bed. I wanted to protect my investment from any possibe accidents but the zippered kind won’t fit because of the tubes that inflate the mattress. This went on like a charm and definitely doesn’t make any crinkle sounds. I have no idea how effectively it works because I haven’t had to test it yet (thankfully!). Will update my review to provide that info if I happen to spill a cup of coffee in bed or whatever my first accident is!
customer_reviews.author: N. Jones

customer_reviews.title: Disgusting, flimsy, unusable!
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived stained all over. The photo shows coffee being spilled on it. I think they sent me that one. Also, pretty much no elastic at all on the corners, so I can't imagine it would stay on the bed very well. Truly terrible product! Return initiated....
customer_reviews.author: Dr. J

customer_reviews.title: Turned out to be a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my sister who has an older cat that sneaks into her room and then pees on the bed. As I had gotten her a new mattress for her birthday, she was reasonably upset. To protect the mattress this was part of the solution. The other was trying to remember to close her door or keep doing laundry. She was impressed with how soft it was and does not crinkle when she sleeps. A hit!
customer_reviews.author: E. Durham

customer_reviews.title: it's not waterproof. at all. we had a ...
customer_reviews.text: it's not waterproof. at all. we had a water spill on the bed - it went through the mattress cover and through this "waterproof" mattress pad protector all the way through to the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Cee Cee Gee

customer_reviews.title: ordered by accident when my wife said we already had them on the bed
customer_reviews.text: I guess we already had them on our bed and didn't know it. nobody has incontinence, or spills much so no idea if or if it doesn't work. We use only to quality sheets, so if I didn't know they were there, probably will be fine. I will take them to Scotland for my vacation home, some of my guests do dumb things like leave burning cigarettes on tables, or worse, so protecting the mattresses would be good as my manager has just a few hours to turn the cottage over to the next renter. will see how it works, but my wife says we already have one there, but not on the pullout beds.
customer_reviews.author: a cameron

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: Since I've used this, nothing has got through to the mattress. Provides excellent protection, very fair price, and you wouldn't even notice it's there under the sheet. I liked it so much, I bought a 2nd one, so I could trade out when I wash it. The only minor thing is that I always struggle to figure out how to orient it to fit it onto the mattress. I should probably just mark it so I know which way it goes, and that is probably more on me than on the product.
customer_reviews.author: S. Adams

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I recently purchased this and am incredibly satisfied with the product and the price. The only negative reviews are from people who didn't realize you have to change it after a few years. It's really soft, doesn't make any noise, and doesn't cause my body heat to increase. Great product all around! I completely forgot it's under my sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Justine C

customer_reviews.title: Real water resistance and soft
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for my queen size bed and didn't care much about if it was water resistance or not. However when I accidently drop my cup and this item helps me a lot for protecting my matress. I really don't know how I could clean the matress. Now I just need to wash this protector. And even without bedsheet, this protector is soft enough to sleep directly on it. I like it very much.
customer_reviews.author: Aileen Lo

customer_reviews.title: Garbage.
customer_reviews.text: This item is cheap but does not hold up. I had 2 tares in the material surrounding the waterproof cover. Very thin material that tares if you look at it. Garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Zellers

customer_reviews.title: great value
customer_reviews.text: this is a really durable mattress protector. i had to get it bc my toddler sleeps with is still, and she was wetting the bad for a little while. it has been washed and dried multiple times and holds up better than the expensive one i bought at the store. i ordered one for our bed and a twin size for her room.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs Gio

customer_reviews.title: The mattress pad is pretty soft and fits well enough
customer_reviews.text: The mattress pad is pretty soft. I have not tested the waterproof feature yet. The pad is good quality. The pad fits the mattress well enough but not perfect. I would recommend this product................................. I've been using the pad for several months now and just washed it in the washing machine, bulky, gentle cycle. I still haven't tested the waterproofing yet, but the washing machine spin cycle didn't get the water out. I had to hang it up to drip and then squeeze it by hand before putting in the dryer for over a hour on low heat...
customer_reviews.author: MarkD

customer_reviews.title: Great fit for deep pocket mattress
customer_reviews.text: I was having problems for years with sheets coming up on my mattress every night. I realized, I needed to get a mattress cover that was for a 18" mattress - deep pocket. This is GREAT, my sheets fit perfectly and never ride up. I washed it upon arrival on gentle cycle and gentle dryer cycle and it came out beautifully. Its not crunchy sounding at all, its soft and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: SYoung

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover for my new $1800 mattress. I have an older lab who sometimes have accidents In her sleep. I couldn’t believe the quality for the price. Mattress store tried to sell me a cover for $100. This is the same quality. Before putting it on, I ran it under my sink to make sure it really is waterproof. I had the sink running in the same spot and it stayed dry. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Fits deep pocket mattress. Update, works!!
customer_reviews.text: Fits my deep-pocket, sleep number, king, mattress. Doesn’t bunch, crinkle, smell or slide. Purchased to ensure that my senior dachshund, whom was recently diagnosed with Cushing’s Disease, may continue to sleep with us. The water proof aspect of the product hasn’t been tested yet. The fit and comfort of this cover is 5stars. Update, my dog did urinate in the bed. Mattress cover absorbed and kept my mattress dry! Cover washed on delicate and dry med low heat. A+
customer_reviews.author: MLH

customer_reviews.title: 4 year old put this to the test. It works!
customer_reviews.text: I use a featherbed, bamboo pad, and bamboo sheets over my mattress. It’s like sleeping on a supportive cloud. But it’s a huge ordeal if it gets wet. We cosleep and the little one has been having accidents since COVID turned her little life upside down. It soaks through everything. You can’t wash a king size feather bed and a mattress is tough to clean. I put this cover over the feather bed. It’s under the bamboo pad so I still have to wash that but it keeps my feathers dry and that was my goal.
customer_reviews.author: Lv317

customer_reviews.title: I liked it till...
customer_reviews.text: I really liked this product, for well and was easy till I learned the hard way it is not water proof in the slightest.... now part of my mattress is ruined.
customer_reviews.author: Analise

customer_reviews.title: I'm surprised it repels moisture
customer_reviews.text: It's surprising something so thin repels water so well. It's thin, see through, and deep enough to engulf my custom-made memory foam mattress. I can confirm: 65lbs dog urinated a night's worth of fluid on my bed...the mattress remained perfectly dry. Worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I'm mad I didn't buy this sooner! My son pees the bed every so often and he sleeps with me. It does exactly what it is suppose to and it doesn't take away from the mattress feeling. It does have a crunchy sound when you get on the bed but I can't tell it's there when I'm sleeping. Easy to wash.
customer_reviews.author: Lissa cini

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof to an extent. I bought this for my ...
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof to an extent. I bought this for my son for potty training. If he wet the bed it went through to the mattress. Washing this is a pain as well. Bc of the lining it won’t completely dry even after two dry cycles.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not thrilled
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to protect our new mattresses. Although the top of the cover is soft, the backside is plastic. It makes the mattress feel stiff and holds in body heat. after a few weeks we took them off and realized that our new mattress was softer than we thought. It might be good for a child/bed wetter, but it is not comfortable for an adult.
customer_reviews.author: Judith A. Gray

customer_reviews.title: This is a solid product.
customer_reviews.text: Real talk: I worked for a mattress company that sold a very similar product for $99 a queen and $119 a king. I saw this and my snooty self thought I’d be returning it because it couldn’t possibly be to the same caliber as what we had...I can’t tell the difference. Literally I believe the company also makes this brand because they’re the exact same. The only difference is that the tag is different. The material is the same. The. Exact. Same. I’ll absolutely be buying this for backups for my potty training kids.
customer_reviews.author: KG

customer_reviews.title: It works but the stains are hard to remove from the mattress protector
customer_reviews.text: Oh this mattress protector definitely works if you do as most do and spilled wine on your bed and forget about it until the next day... Well at least you'll breathe a sigh of relief when you realize that the rest of your mattress is untouched Unfortunately the terry cloth fabric soaks up liquids like it's a thirsty monster and they are basically impossible to remove stains from My cleaning lady even tried shout but could not get the red stain to leave So I'm bumping a star off of this rating It still works though so it's definitely worth investing in
customer_reviews.author: R

customer_reviews.title: Quality ok
customer_reviews.text: It does the job, has a GREAT fit for a Cal King (which is unusual as we often get sheet with too shallow pockets) but the quality/feel could definitely be better. In total, I think it is worth the price, but if you are looking for high end, you probably will want to pay a little more and get it somewhere else.
customer_reviews.author: Modesty Blaise

customer_reviews.title: Soft and waterproof! 💦
customer_reviews.text: Survived a few potty training accidents already. I'm talking no diaper full on accidents lol. I also put the square waterproof "incontinence pads" under neath for the just in case cuz why not? But so far the deep memory foam mattress has been safe! And it's soft and quiet. Not loud, crunchy, and hot like some matress pads.
customer_reviews.author: Justin

customer_reviews.title: MY MATTRESS IS RUINED
customer_reviews.text: This product claims to be waterproof. I have had this mattress for two months. My son wet the bed. We removed this protector and saw several urine stains. I am livid. I can not find any contact information for Tastelife. Neither can Amazon. They're opening a case against them. DO NOT BUY THIS PRODUCT.
customer_reviews.author: Angie McCarty

customer_reviews.title: Does the job
customer_reviews.text: This mattress protector is a great option for the price. I have several animals and a fiance who likes to drink (and spill) coffee in bed. Luckily, this protector has saved our new mattress from stains/smells. I was a little concerned when I first opened the package, because the protector did make a little bit of noise when putting it on the mattress. However, once it is on and covered by sheets, there was no sound.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda

customer_reviews.title: Works for the extra thick mattresses, waterproof breathable but not soft.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great on my thick mattress with memory foam topper, I'm surprised at how well it breathes. The fabric it's made out of does have a crinkly sound to it like tent fabric or sleeping bags but it is flexible and almost stretchy. The top is supposed to be soft but it feels more like a super cheap washcloths like what you would get at Dollar tree 10 for a dollar (thin and scratchy)
customer_reviews.author: zoomzoom870

customer_reviews.title: No noise , comfortable and washable
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've bought. Love it. My girlfriend is a squirter and it never gets to the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: nice waterproof cover
customer_reviews.text: nice mattress cover for the cost. some reviews state that its 'loud' due to the plastic backing on the cover. I found that it wasn't as bad as some people made it out to be. i guess it depends on your personal preference. I did notice a slight difference in noise when it came to actually laying on the cover once the bed was made, but for me personally, it did not hamper my sleep experience.
customer_reviews.author: S. Adamak

customer_reviews.title: Stop struggling with your mattress pad
customer_reviews.text: This is the best waterproof mattress pad I've ever owned and I'm buying them for the rest of our beds. This waterproof mattress pad can go into the dryer on high heat and doesn't melt. It doesn't shrink in the dryer so you don't need a team to put it on—it's a one person job, even on a bunk bed.
customer_reviews.author: All Day Mom

customer_reviews.title: Fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I got a king for my sleep number. Easy to wash and dry and fits bed perfect. I wish though it was a litte thicker Don't know if it waterproof yet . I do have 4 grandsons and they always sleep with me. I don't want to take any chances of damage my sleepnumber bed, it is to expensive
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice
customer_reviews.text: The last mattress cover I had couldn't survive the occasional washing so I tossed it out. I really like this one. It has a very nice terry-cloth-like top. Some mattress covers are basically big plastic bags, but this one feels like actual bedding. It survived its first wash without any issues and I think this will give me a lot of service life. No smell, which surprised me.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Booker

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy if you need waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not waterproof at all. Would not recommend. Keep forgetting to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Bethany

customer_reviews.title: Durable and so helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to protect our old foam mattress. It's huge and has been the only mattress to help with my back problems. The original protective cover it came with got damaged during our move so I bought this and it's awesome. Has been doing a good job keeping the foam together and protecting it from accidental spills (i.e., our puppy when she couldn't hold in her pee anymore, lol.)
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: If you want waterproof... this is the right cover!
customer_reviews.text: We bought several twin covers for our couches to protect against puppy accidents. They have saved us so much stress, if there is an accident we just pull off the sheet and mattress cover and put it in the wash. They are still waterproof after several washes (washed cold and air dry). I don't notice any real noise as other reviews have mentioned but perhaps that's because the waterproof factor far outweighs any noise these make.
customer_reviews.author: Zohra

customer_reviews.title: Makes your mattress uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: This is probably decent quality. I’m returning because it changed the way the mattress felt and I don’t mean in terms of softness. It seemed to reduce the amount of “give” my memory foam mattress had and I did not like that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: Mine arrived today. I tried to put it on my brand new queen mattress. I had to force it on because the corners kept coming up. My mattress isn’t very thick, which I’m assuming the sizes are way off. The protection pad doesn’t even cover the full top of my mattress.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof.
customer_reviews.text: Isn’t actually waterproof at all, I was disappointed that the first time my daughter peed in the bed it still got on the mattress. Although it did absorb some of it, what it didn’t absorb is now forever in the mattress.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn Jacobs/Haley Cain

customer_reviews.title: Just like the $100 one
customer_reviews.text: I have a tempurpedic bed and my mattress protector that I got with the bed cost me $100. The protective plastic layer just shredded after years of wear and washing/drying. (Had it like 5/ 6years) I needed a replacement and you can’t beat this for the price. It’s basically the exact same thing tempur-pedic sells for a quarter of the price. I’m going to buy a 2nd one for this price
customer_reviews.author: Pen Name

customer_reviews.title: Must-have for any mattress
customer_reviews.text: Originally purchased for my son's mattress as he started potty training, however he didn't like sleeping in his bed so I put it on mine and it has kept a new mattress looking and smelling clean for over a year! Easy to wash, easy to spread over mattress, and great at what it's suppose to do. My son has spilled lots of drinks in my bed, and this has saved my mattress every time.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Worked great!!
customer_reviews.text: This was on my daughter’s Christmas list. I thought it would be more pad like but I didn’t read all of the information on it. Shortly after putting it on her bed one of her dogs piddled on the bed. It was a true test for being waterproof and it worked great! No moisture got to the mattress. I would definitely recommend this if you have pets, kids being potty trained or just to protect your mattress from nightly use.
customer_reviews.author: Karen S.

customer_reviews.title: Noisy with unpleasant terry top
customer_reviews.text: This item would make unpleasant sounds when touched. Also the grain of the terry cloth is unpleasant to touch.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Laswell

customer_reviews.title: Good fitment, good quality and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: We are potty training a 4 year and a 3 year who shared a queen size mattress. A waterproof mattress cover is needed to protect the mattress from any kind of fluid. This mattress cover is very comfortable, the fitment is good. It is made of quality fabric.
customer_reviews.author: Cozilla

customer_reviews.title: If you’re familiar with sleeping on a garbage bag you’ll feel right at home
customer_reviews.text: If you like sleeping on garbage bags that can make you equally hot and uncomfortable then this one is for you.
customer_reviews.author: James Hewett

customer_reviews.title: Good mattress cover, quiet, cool, doesn’t let liquids through.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this while pregnant because I was convinced my water would break while sleeping. Thankfully it didn’t! I kept it on once baby was here and it’s been really useful. I’ve had awful night sweats and baby has spit up all over our bed and it’s never let a drop through! I’ll be keeping it on the mattress for a very long time! Oh also. It doesn’t sound crinkly or loud, my husband didn’t even know it was on the bed for a week until we changed the sheets. It doesn’t make the bed extra hot either.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and effective
customer_reviews.text: This mattress cover did exactly what we hoped it would do. It prevents spilled liquids from staining your mattress, for one thing. We didn't do any extreme testing on this; just poured some water onto the mattress cover with a bowl underneath. Nothing got through. What pleased us the most, though, was that this mattress cover is relatively cool, which helps us get a good night's rest. Well worth the inexpensive price!
customer_reviews.author: Mike in Edmonds, WA

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: This product is waterproof and I love that the pockets are really deep so it does not slide off. The first night I put it on my sons new bed he ended up having an accident and this mattress was completely dry. Just took it off and threw it in the wash with this sheets.
customer_reviews.author: Val

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and is soft
customer_reviews.text: I fried my previous mattress cover in the dryer, but it was over three years old, so I didn't feel too bad about it. I wanted a replacement that didn't make noise or keep in body heat. This fits the bill as it is very soft and so far my husband has complained of being too hot. I also like that it doesn't make a swishy sound when you roll over in bed.
customer_reviews.author: MNL

customer_reviews.title: Great investment for mattress protection.
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a pregnant wife. Didnt want her leaking all over my sweet new mattress. I tested it with a cup of water and it held it all there. Also will give an update when she is too old to hold her bladder.
customer_reviews.author: Prime clicker

customer_reviews.title: Bad quality sewing on product
customer_reviews.text: I received this mattress cover yesterday evening. I immediately washed it today. As I was putting it on my bed I saw this hole in one corner end along with the other bad spot on top. They didn’t even sew the seams correctly. Frustrating! I’ll be looking for a better quality product soon. But I need this because it is deep enough to cover the mattress topper and mattress at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Dorlisa Butler

customer_reviews.title: Awesome find!
customer_reviews.text: This works like a charm on my TempurPedic mattress. My son sleeps in my bed and sometimes pees though his diaper. This has saved my mattress! I have washed it several times and it’s holding up great. I was skeptical because of the price..when I first got my bed, I paid almost $100 for a waterproof mattress pad. This works just as well for a fraction of the cost. Definitely recommend to any parents out there who share their bed with kiddos!
customer_reviews.author: Kelly White

customer_reviews.title: WATERPROOF
customer_reviews.text: I recently had to re-do my boys bedroom into a shared bedroom. They both received new mattresses and it was important that I had protection on them. My youngest still wets the bed every once in awhile. Accidents happen, but cleaning up said accidents are a total pain and can ruin mattresses quickly! The night after I put this on my son had an accident. Totally saved his mattress!! This may be the best mattress saver out there and plan to get 2 more for all our other beds as well! Fits great! No noise! Comfortable! PERFECT
customer_reviews.author: Tankard

customer_reviews.title: Breathable, Protective
customer_reviews.text: Great product to protect our bed from the drips and drops that children create. The waterproof mattress pad protects our (queen sized) mattress from water, but also doesn’t get too hot. Many waterproof mattress pads are not breathable and cause sweating during the night. However, with this product, this is not the case! This mattress pad protects our bed and provides maximum comfort, all night long.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Preusser

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Makes noise when we move. Otherwise great! I’ve been looking for a good protector for our mattress and topper combined but everything has been too small until this topper. It covers everything PERFECTLY!
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable waterproof mattress protector
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable mattress protector. This protector has really deep pocket that can cover not just the mattress, but the box spring as well. It is also very soft and comfortable with the waterproof layer. It is pretty quiet when you turn or move on the bed. I bought this as a spare for my full size bed and am happy with the fit and overall quality of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria Hsieh

customer_reviews.title: Great for those that doesn't own a gel memory foam topper
customer_reviews.text: I bought this protector since I have a 5 month old that likes to lay in bed with me. She hasn't wet my bed yet, but I purchased it as a form of precaution. The protector fits my mattress perfectly, however since I have a 3" gel memory foam topper on my mattress that I purchased recently, the memory foam loses its effectiveness by not being able to hug my body as I sleep. I will still keep the protector though.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda Morales

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a bath towel
customer_reviews.text: I thought this has some cushion to it but it’s flat and looks like a large towel turned into a mattress cover . I would not recommend . I have since returned the product
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Buy it!!! Love this thing and everyone should have one!
customer_reviews.text: I use a sheet on top of this protector and I can’t hear a thing! Without the colored sheet: not scratchy and still don’t get hardly any plastic noises. Water test= didn’t go through!! Mattress protected! It’s the perfect size, snug but not hard to get on the mattress.. also, My mattress is about 1 1/2 feet tall and this protected still has plenty of fabric to tuck under. It could definitely fit around a standard box spring AND mattress. (The gray part of my bed is the frame)
customer_reviews.author: PJ Milligan

customer_reviews.title: Worked first night when our senior cat vomited on this!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in perfect timing! Got new egg-crate topper (HUGE plus) for our mattress and knew I had to have a protector due to our senior cat you does sleep in our bed and can't always hold down her food (rarely vomits but bad when it does happen) this arrived at the perfect time- I washed immediately and put on our bed and w/I 24 hours our sweet cat lost her lunch. To my relief, it did not allow anything to seep through- I am 100% pleased and would recommend this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. Covered in plastic. Product update: my son just peed all over bed last night. Mattress is totally dry which is a good thing. However, the top/surface part stayed wet and bothered him on his sleep, so we woke up crying and I had to remove it. So overall I’m happy with purchase. However I’ll probably buy one more as a back up for when incidents happen so I can have the mattress protected while I’m washing the wet one.
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: water resistant and fits perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my baby is on potty training and he had an accident, he pee on the mattress while he was sleeping. So I hurry to purchase the waterproof protector just in case he pee on bed again. I am so glad that I purchased this, he pee on the bed again the other day, and the protector really works, it’s water resistant, my mattress wasn’t wet at all, and it’s so easy to clean. I highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Shirley

customer_reviews.title: Hate to have to test it but passed with 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: After discovering that our former mattress pad was not "water" resistant as advertised we tried this one. Our unhappiness with our dog was tempered by the complete success of this cover protecting our mattress. Relieved... just like our lazy dog.
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Araki

customer_reviews.title: I had this product before
customer_reviews.text: 17 years ago, I purchased this with a new bed & have been looking for another ever since. It is not padded, which I like. The top part is a small terrycloth feel and the underneath is a plastic, so liquids do not seep onto the mattress. My old one wore out but lasted a long time. You cannot hear the plastic underneath; it's a soft plastic and easy to use. I am happy I found this again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: easy cleaning with machine wash
customer_reviews.text: It fits my king size memory foam mattress with 12 inches depth. Covers well and does not move. I put a bedsheet on top of it and it does not make any noise. My daughter dropped some orange juice on it and it blocked the juice very week. I threw it into washer and all dirt are gone. No weird color left. One thing to mention is not to put other clothes to wash and dry together because some clothes were wrapped around by the mattress protector. Wash it alone or with bedsheet only.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: Finally a mattress protector that fits a deep mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Very happy to have found this mattress protector. We have a very deep hybrid mattress and finding sheets has been a challenge. This mattress protector fits great with room to spare. I would estimate our mattress is almost 20in deep so if you are looking for something to fit this size mattress you have found it!
customer_reviews.author: roo

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: best item i ve ever bought in amazon, i was always sweaty when sleeping, so i bought it to protect my mattrass, it has two layers,underneath is a waterproof texture very soft,the first layer is cloth texture, it perfect fits my king size mattrass, and it is amazing i wouldnt sweat at night now, very comfortable. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: luciyaanna

customer_reviews.title: Excellent waterproof cover
customer_reviews.text: Fits nice and tight and does a good job repeling water. First thing I did when I bought it was stand on the bed and shoot a stream all over it! Did a great job of not soaking through so I'm happy about that. Wife was upset at what I did so she took my water gun away from me :( What did you think I was talking about?!
customer_reviews.author: Craig

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT protect mattress from accidents - buy a different product
customer_reviews.text: This is the worst mattress protector. I've had it since 2017 and I'm over having to spray down my daughter's mattress because it did NOT do its job. I follow the care instructions and have washed it many times since December 2017. It protected the mattress the first time only. Afterwards, I found moisture under the protector on the mattress and had to scrub the pee stain and air out the mattress. I've had several other incidents like this over the past two years and I'm finally done. DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY. I'm looking to purchase another one right now that's a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Veronica

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting
customer_reviews.text: From the description I was expecting this mattress cover to be like a duvet cover... nope it is just like any ole fitted sheet... Had I known I would have kept shopping and happily paid more the get what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Furry*Otter

customer_reviews.title: We used this on top the bed for our dogs
customer_reviews.text: My wife cut the sides off the protector and hemmed it up so that we could use it as a bedspread on top the bed to protect the bedding from the mishaps of our senior dogs. She also cut one in half and put it on the couch to protect it. In the last two or three months it has saved the couch and bedding from multiple accidents involving doggie incontinence and dog barf.
customer_reviews.author: Phill

customer_reviews.title: did not keep my memory foam mattress topper dry
customer_reviews.text: I have had this since January and never really checked if it was actually working. My mother is incontinent so I have an extra mattress protector on top of the sheet. She had a really wet night and by passed the first protector, soaked the sheet as well as the tastelife protector. When I removed it for washing I discovered that the pad for the memory foam mattress was wet through to the memory foam. what a mess!! Looking again for a protector.
customer_reviews.author: SueForbrook

customer_reviews.title: No leaks! Yay.
customer_reviews.text: Great for the price. Easy to wash. Water proof as advertised. My dog is old and has little accidents at times. No leaks here. I bought a second one shortly after.
customer_reviews.author: Leeleeinjax

customer_reviews.title: Saved My Mattress!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! We had guests over Thanksgiving break and I thought to buy this mattress pad protector ahead of time. I did not have one with deep pockets. I am so glad I ordered this...On the last night my nephew slept in that room he wet the bed- a lot. The mattress was saved! It could have been a real disaster, definitely worth the investment!
customer_reviews.author: catharine carroll

customer_reviews.title: I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: First night on the bed, it got fully tested. My kitten did what she loves to do (reason I bought this!) There was no leaking through to the under layers of my mattress ( I have a pillow topper and memory foam on my mattress) I was able to EASILY spot clean the terry cloth top covering with just peroxide and vinegar. No stain or smell left behind. As for softness, its perfectly comfortable, in fact I think it's made my bed cooler. However, it does make some noise. About as much noise as a 1980s taffeta prom dress. So not too bad. I've not washed it in the machine yet. But I'm pleased with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Chell C

customer_reviews.title: Protect your mattress and save you cleaning time!!
customer_reviews.text: Originally bought for my Cal King because my daughter who sleeps with me would occasionally have leaks from her diaper and I didn’t want my mattress topper to get damaged. It worked so well that when we got her furniture I bought another for her full size bed to protect her mattress and topper. The fit was great for both sizes and has saved my beds from many accidents. Great investment even for just keeping your mattress “like new” HIGHLY RECOMMEND!!
customer_reviews.author: Crystal

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great product
customer_reviews.text: Fit great on my Sleep Number bed! I haven’t teated the waterproof capability yet but I can’t see it not working with the lined backing. It’s surprisingly not making the bed warmer either. We’re hot sleepers in this household and especially my husband. No complaints from him so far! Also, about the noise it’s really not loud or uncomfortable to us. It’s just a tiny bit of noise and we’re fine with it. Beats vinyl mattress protectors by a long haul.
customer_reviews.author: Reyna

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a great price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and i love the waterproof part. The protector isnt loud when you move around in bed and stretches really far. It was hard to find a 18" deep protector in store and when i did find one it was always expensive. This was a great price and great quality.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon P

customer_reviews.title: Does the job but a little sweaty
customer_reviews.text: I like that this mattress will protect my matress for years to come from my accumulated sweat. However I have noticed in the middle of the night that I wake up with my back and bum a little sweaty. Not a good cover for the summer of you prefer a cooler sleep. I might need to get thicker sheets to not let so much heat be trapped under me. However the sweating is only slight. If you can get thicker sheets, you might not have a problem.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I was really worried this mattress cover would be crunchy. I am pleased that after sleeping on it for quite some time it is soft and not noisy and it protects my memory foam gel mattress. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: suzieqmo

product_meta.title: TASTELIFE King Waterproof Mattress Pad Protector Cover - Fitted 8" - 21" Deep Pocket - Hypoallergenic Vinyl Free(King, White)
feature_bullets: ✔AUTHORITATIVE ORGANIZATIONS CERTIFICATION: TPU Certified by SGS, products quality are proved to be guaranteed, and free of pvc, vinyl, phthalates, fire retardants and other toxic chemicals,it can also guarantee the healthy sleep of you and your family.
✔TOP NBH2O TECHNIQUE: The waterproof barrier protects your valuable mattress from spills and accidents. Soft and silent protection that doesn't disrupt your valuable sleep.

✔BREATHABLE AND SOFT: In this new season, Tastelife combines breathable surface layer and super soft combed cotton material perfectly, starts the new idea of ‘Naked-sleep Degree of Super Soft’ with a high quality 80% cotton & 20% Polyester blending surface and NBH2O TPU back coating; Extends the life of your mattress.
✔ EASY TO KEEP IT CLEAN: Machine washable, which adds the convenience of washing and drying easy
✔TOLERANCE AS A VIRTUE: 18 Inches Deep Pocket, All size fit up to 8"-21",King 78"X80" 10-year warranty

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars5,570 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
